flexibleContent.heading: As a prominent eCommerce development company, Techtic offers cutting-edge eCommerc solutions to startup and existing businesses to grow and scale faster.

contentLists.heading: Responsive eCommerce Website Design
contentLists.content: Design your eCommerce site with us that responds to your customers’ behaviors and environment according to screen size, orientation, and platform.

contentLists.heading: eCommerce Store Development
contentLists.content: B2B, B2C, or marketplace, our eCommerce website development service aims at helping you sell more and spend less time managing operations.

contentLists.heading: Custom eCommerce Web Development Services
contentLists.content: We can help you customize everything in your eCommerce platform, how it functions, looks, and behaves in response to user actions, and more with optimum performance.

contentLists.heading: Multi-Vendor eCommerce Store Development
contentLists.content: Create a sensational multi-vendor eCommerce store on which every vendor in your niche wants to be available, and customers want to shop.

contentLists.heading: eCommerce Shopping Cart Development
contentLists.content: We customize a shopping cart that helps you meet your business goals by simplifying your products and services, promotions, and sales.

contentLists.heading: Progressive Web Applications(PWA) Development
contentLists.content: Increase user engagement that leads to higher revenue generation with our eCommerce developers who are masters in eCommerce PWA development.

contentLists.heading: Plugin & Module Development
contentLists.content: Customize a plugin or module for your eCommerce platform based on your unique needs to enrich the shopping experience for your customers.

contentLists.heading: Payment Gateway Integration
contentLists.content: Payment is the soul of the checkout process. That’s why Techtic helps with integrations of payment APIs which are used by your target audience.

contentLists.heading: Store Migration & Updates
contentLists.content: Whether Shopify to WooCommerce or Magento, you name it, and we can migrate and update your eCommerce store seamlessly without missing a single function.

contentLists.heading: Maintenance & Support
contentLists.content: Techtic eCommerce development company not only develops but also backs digital stores with necessary and advanced maintenance and support services.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop an eCommerce Store?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your eCommerce store and factors like features and functionalities you want to have in your eCommerce store development project. To precisely understand in-detail please, you can email us your eCommerce store development project requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch with us today.

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop an eCommerce Store?
contentLists.content: The development cost of eCommerce Store is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop an eCommerce store, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: What are the hiring models for eCommerce Development Service?
contentLists.content: We offers fixed time/price model or fixed dedicated resource model for your eCommerce store development service. You can choose hiring model as per your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use to track my eCommerce store development project?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and track every phase of eCommerce store development. We build your eCommerce store/website on our development server, so that you can monitor the progress of your website. Project Management Tools are:

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: Does your developed eCommerce Store/Website Mobile Friendly & Search Engine Friendly?
contentLists.content:
Yes, our eCommerce developers build Mobile Friendly & Search Engine Friendly eCommerce store/website.

We strictly follow responsive website guidelines and ensure that store/website works well on a wide variety of screen sizes, from tablets and smartphones to small & large desktop monitors.

We strictly follow all Google Webmaster and other Search engine guidelines while developing store/website.

contentLists.heading: Do I own the ownership and the code of my eCommerce Store Project?
contentLists.content: Yes, we will give you code ownership after the completion of eCommerce Store Development. However, in some cases, depends on the NDA terms, then we claim ownership.

contentLists.heading: Is there any hidden cost?
contentLists.content: Techtic Solutions, a renowned WordPress development agency that believes in transparency.

contentLists.heading: Do you provide me support after the eCommerce store/website is developed?
contentLists.content: Yes, at Techtic Solutions, our eCommerce developers are always eager to provide support and help for your requirements of new features, maintenance and regular updates.

contentLists.heading: Do you use templates to design my eCommerce store/website?
contentLists.content: No, every business deserves a unique design for their eCommerce store/website. So, our eCommerce designers design mockups of your eCommerce store and take approval from you.
